tool.name: PermutationClustering (in docker)
tool.command:
##Rscript example ##Rscript main.R annotated_lorenz_testSCumi_mm10 4 2 10 3 4 csv , 0 griph 0 10 1111
ln -s $MatrixName /scratch/${NameMatrix}.${Format} &&
Rscript /home/main.R ${NameMatrix} $NPerm $PermAtTime $Percent $Range1 $Range2 $Format $Separator $LogTen $Clustering $Rk $Perplexity $Seed 2>$log && mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && bash $__tool_directory__/files.sh $html_file.extra_files_path $html_file

param.name: NPerm
param.help: number of permutations to perform the pValue to evaluate clustering

param.name: PermAtTime
param.help: number of permutations that can be computes in parallel

param.name: Percent
param.help: percentage of randomly selected cells removed in each permutation

param.name: Range1
param.help: first number of cluster for k means algorithm

param.name: Range2
param.help: last number of cluster for k means algorithm

param.name: Separator
param.help: separator used in count file, e.g. '\\t', ','

param.name: LogTen
param.help: 1 if the count matrix is already in log10, 0 otherwise

param.name: Clustering
param.help: clustering method to use : SIMLR , tSne or griph

param.name: Rk
param.help: 1 for rankGene algorithm 0 otherwise WARNING, very slow with this feature. This parameter is specific for SIMLR. Setting this parameter to 1 with other clustering methods will not give any different result to set the parameter to 0.

param.name: Perplexity
param.help: Number of close neighbors for each point. This parameter is specific for tSne. Default value is 10.Setting this parameter when use a clustering method different by tSne will be ignored.

param.name: Seed
param.help: important value to reproduce the same results with same input
